Opening Weekend 2008/2009

Posted on Monday, December 15, 2008

It has been a bit of a late start to the season here in Washington, but we finally got a big system that dropped nearly two feet on the resorts. Crystal Mountain opened on Saturday morning, and we took advantage of the good early season conditions. I went back up on Sunday with some co-workers and was lucky enough to get some pow turns in December! It was a great start to the season.

Ms. Fontenot strapping in.

Nap time!
